title: Restaurants
name: Restaurants
description:
A Map by Ldpmap

Restaurants reviewed by the Liverpool Daily Post - click &lt;a href=&quot;http://www.liverpooldailypost.co.uk/restaurants&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt; to read reviews



here to read reviews

properties.name: 60 Hope Street
properties.description: Posted by LdpmapHope Street, Liverpool60 Hope Street, Liverpool, 0151 707 6060 Opening times: Food served Monday to Saturday: lunch 12 -2.30pm, dinner 6-10.30pm last orders, closed all day Sunday and Bank Holidays. Value for money: Excellent Service: Very friendly without being intrusive.

properties.name: Bistro Jacques,  Hardman Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by LdpmapHardman Street, Liverpool37-39 Hardman Street, Liverpool, 0151 709 1998 Interior: Typical French bistro Food: Good, hearty French cuisine Value for money: Excellent

properties.name: Deli Fonseca, Stanley Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmapstanley street, liverpoolTel: 0151 255 0808 Interior: Pleasant Service: Very friendly and informal Disabled access: No Children: Welcome Open: Monday to Saturday 11.30am till late (last orders to the kitchen at around 9.30pm). It will also be open on Sundays in the run-up to Christmas.

properties.name: Ha Ha Bar and Canteen
properties.description: Posted by LdpmapAlbert Dock, LiverpoolTel: 0151 707 7877 Style: Open-plan, relaxed bar/ restaurant Service: Swift and friendly Value: Good Bill: £36.50 for two, including alcoholic drinks

properties.name: Il Forno, Duke Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmapduke street, liverpoolTel: 0151 709 4002 Menu: Italian Decor: Modern and a bit novelty Child friendly: Yes Service: Friendly Value: Good

properties.name: Korova
properties.description: Posted by LdpmapWood Street, LiverpoolTel: 0151 709 7097 Menu: Expansive and has something for everyone. Service: Very good, friendly and keen to please Value: Good, especially for a city centre venue The bill: £27.30

properties.name: Mayur Indian
properties.description: Posted by LdpmapDuke Street, LiverpoolMayur, Duke Street, Liverpool Tel: 709 9955 Menu: Healthy twist on Indian cuisine Decor: Contemporary and up-market

properties.name: Meet Brazilian, 66 Bold Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmap66 Bold Street, LiverpoolTel: 0151 707 6507 Menu: Brazilian, with lots of choice of meat and fish dishes Service: Good

properties.name: Room Restaurant, Castle Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmap castle street, liverpool0151 258 1122 Interior: Modern fittings in a classic setting Service: Friendly and attentive Disabled access: None to raised restaurant area. Wheelchair-bound diners enter through neighbouring hotel and have to eat in bar area Smoking: Yes Food: Retro dishes given contemporary makeover Children: Yes

properties.name: Savina Mexican Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmap duke street, liverpoolTel: 0151 708 9095 Menu: Extensive and interesting Service: Attentive and friendly Value: Very good

properties.name: The Olive Press, Castle Street, Liverpool
properties.description: Posted by Ldpmapcastle street, liverpoolTel: 0151 227 2242 Interior: Dimly lit and rustic. Service: Very pleasant, but hard to attract attention. Value for money: Excellent
